title: Momentum: a crash course
creator_credit: Shane Mulcahy, Jim Joyce, Trish Pilley and Box Hill College of Technical and Further Education
brief_description: Uses simple collision between ice-skaters and gliders on an air track to develop the concepts of momentum and impulse and shows how these can be used in conjunction with the principles of conservation of momentim to analyse the changes in motion that occur in collisions.
creator_credit_for_label: Shane Mulcahy, Jim Joyce, Trish Pilley and Box Hill College of Technical and Further Education
